verses.name: Job 39:24
verses.text: He swalloweth the ground with fierceness and rage: neither believeth he that it is the sound of the trumpet.

verses.name: Job 39:25
verses.text: He saith among the trumpets, Ha, ha; and he smelleth the battle afar off, the thunder of the captains, and the shouting.

verses.name: Job 39:26
verses.text: Doth the hawk fly by thy wisdom, and stretch her wings toward the south?

verses.name: Job 39:27
verses.text: Doth the eagle mount up at thy command, and make her nest on high?

verses.name: Job 39:28
verses.text: She dwelleth and abideth on the rock, upon the crag of the rock, and the strong place.

verses.name: Job 39:29
verses.text: From thence she seeketh the prey, and her eyes behold afar off.
